level.text: 828.1 A respondent aggrieved by a final decision of the Commission after aearing on the matter may seek review of the decision by the District ofolumbia Court of Appeals pursuant to section 11 of the District of Columbiadministrative Procedure Act, approved October 21, 1968 (82 Stat. 1209; D.C.fficial Code ยง 2-510).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 9052 (December 4, 1992); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 8439 (October 23, 2009),ncorporating by reference text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 5622,642 (July 10, 2009).
